name: tainacan-brennand
description: Suporte para telas do plugin Tainacan em uso no tema da Oficina Brennand

scripts.compile-styles: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 sass/style.scss style.css
scripts.build: npm run compile-styles && npm run css-minify

author: mateuswetah
